Host Unforgettable Large-Scale Events at Hilton Ocala
What makes our venue the ideal choice for your next major event? It’s our unique ability to blend natural Florida beauty with first-class infrastructure. We are more than just an open field; we are a complete event destination.
Expansive 6+ Acre Grounds:
A flexible, blank canvas ready to be transformed for your car show, music festival, or market.
8,000 sq ft Covered Pavilion:
Our Palm Terrace Pavilion offers a massive, weather-proof space for vendor hubs, dining, or main-stage activities.
On-Site Hilton Hotel:
Provide ultimate convenience for your vendors, staff, and attendees with luxurious on-site accommodations.
Ample & Accessible Parking:
We have plenty of space to accommodate hundreds of vehicles, ensuring smooth entry and exit for your guests.
Full-Service Amenities:
Leverage our two on-site restaurants, bar, catering services, and resort-style pool and patio to elevate your event.
Prime Location:
Conveniently located in Ocala with easy access for all of North Central Florida.
Outdoor Car Show Event Venue
Rev up your engines!
If you’re searching for the ultimate location to host a
large car show or dynamic car meet-up in Ocala
, look no further. Our venue boasts
plenty of outdoor space
to showcase every vehicle, ample
space for vendors
, and the convenience of
onsite restaurants & bar
to keep everyone fueled and refreshed. Plus, with an
onsite hotel & pool
, out-of-town guests can enjoy a seamless experience.
Rent our outdoor event space
and make your next car event an unforgettable success!
Schedule Private Tour
Serene Outdoor Yoga Oasis
Discover your perfect yoga retreat at our beautiful outdoor venue! Nestled among
picture-perfect trees
, our space offers a truly
relaxing outdoor ambiance
ideal for finding your flow. It’s perfectly suited for
large groups
, making it an excellent choice for a memorable yoga retreat or a vibrant outdoor yoga event. Find your center surrounded by nature’s tranquility.
Schedule Private Tour
Ocala's Ultimate Outdoor Festival & Event Grounds
Unleash the possibilities for your next major event at Ocala’s premier outdoor festival and event space! With
over 6 acres of expansive grounds
, our versatile venue is
perfect for all event types
, from vibrant
Beerfests and sophisticated Food & Wine Festivals to bustling Outdoor Markets, thrilling Carnivals, and beyond.
Plus, with the convenience of an
onsite hotel
, planning and attending your large-scale event has never been easier. Host your unforgettable experience here!
Schedule Private Tour
Host Your Unforgettable Event in Ocala
From serene yoga retreats amidst
picture-perfect trees
to high-octane
car shows
with all the amenities, and expansive
festivals
attracting thousands –
we are Ocala’s premier destination for large outdoor events.
With
over 6 acres of versatile space
, combined with the convenience of
onsite restaurants, bars, and hotels
, we offer the ideal setting and support to make your vision a reality.
Choose us to host your next extraordinary outdoor event in Ocala and experience unparalleled success.
Explore the perfect space for your next gathering and discover all the Hilton Ocala has to offer, just minutes from Ocala’s renowned horse farms and historic downtown.

Wedding Pavilion in Ocala
Palm Terrace Pavilion
Looking for a spacious and scenic venue for your wedding or event in Ocala?
This expansive outdoor covered pavilion boasts 8,000 square feet of space (approximately 100′ x 80′), offering a flexible setting to accommodate up to 880 guests for a reception or 600 for a banquet.
Imagine saying “I do”
bathed in natural light with a picturesque backdrop, or picture a vibrant reception where guests mingle and dance under the stars.
880 Capacity Reception
600 Capacity Banquet
8,000 sq ft
See packages and prices
880 Capacity Reception
600 Capacity Banquet
8,000 sq ft

Ballroom Event Venue
Churchill Grand Ballroom:
Capacity: 600 reception, 360 banquet
Size: 4,200 square feet
Features: Soaring 12-foot ceilings, elegant design, customizable atmosphere
Key Benefits:
Unparalleled Elegance:
Create a stunning and memorable event in a luxurious setting.
Flexible Space:
Accommodate a variety of events, from intimate gatherings to large celebrations.
Customization:
Tailor the ballroom to match your vision and create a personalized experience.
Ideal for:
Weddings
Corporate Events
Conferences
Receptions
Galas
Learn More
Event Space Walkthrough
TAKE A LIVE TOUR:
Take a live tour of our Saratoga Ballroom by moving your screen to explore every angle of this elegant 1,540 sq. ft. event space with 10-foot ceilings—perfect for receptions up to 172 guests.
Take a live tour of our Saratoga Ballroom by moving your screen to explore every angle of this elegant 1,540 sq. ft. event space with 10-foot ceilings—perfect for receptions up to 172 guests.
Barn Wedding Venue
White Barn:
Rustic Charm Meets Modern Elegance
Key Features:
Spacious and relaxed atmosphere
Endless customization possibilities
Versatile spaces for any event size
Stunning natural backdrop
Perfect for unforgettable photo opportunities
Ideal for:
Intimate ceremonies
Grand receptions
Rustic-themed weddings
Couples seeking a unique and personalized experience
Experience the magic of a farmhouse wedding and create memories that will last a lifetime.
Learn More
Outdoor Gazebo Event Venue
Outdoor Gazebo:
Rustic Charm Meets Modern Elegance
Key Features:
Picture-perfect outdoor setting
Fresh air and sunshine
Breathtaking views
Customizable ceremony
Flexible options to suit your vision
Ideal for:
Couples seeking a romantic and intimate atmosphere
Those who dream of an outdoor wedding
Those who desire a personalized ceremony
Learn More
Palm Terrace Pavilion:
Key Features:
Expansive outdoor space: 8,000 square feet
Accommodates large groups: Up to 880 guests for receptions, 600 for banquets
Scenic backdrop and natural light
Flexible space for customization
Ideal for weddings, corporate events, festivals, and concerts
Contact us today to schedule a tour and learn more!
Learn More
Saratoga Ballroom
Key Features:
Elegant setting for special occasions
Capacity: 172 reception, 120 banquet
Versatile space: 1,540 square feet
Soaring 10-foot ceilings
Timeless charm and atmosphere
Ideal for:
Weddings
Corporate events
Receptions
Private celebrations
Learn More
Flexible Outdoor Event Venue Spaces
Classic Tree & Outdoor SPACES
Nature’s Perfect Setting Key Features:
Serene and picturesque outdoor environment
Lush greenery and towering trees
Tranquil backdrop for unforgettable events
Customizable to fit your vision
Ideal for:
Weddings
Corporate events
Intimate gatherings
Learn More
Corporate Meetings and Events
Host Your Next Corporate Event in Ocala, FL
From team-building retreats to conferences, our venue includes:
High-speed Wi-Fi and AV equipment.
Flexible seating for 10–880 attendees.
Onsite Catering from award winning chefs
Discounts for multi-day bookings.
Popular With: Florida-based businesses, equestrian organizations, and healthcare groups
See all event and meetings spaces
On and Off Premise Catering
Award-Winning Catering
Indulge in culinary excellence from our award-winning chef.
Choose from customizable menus to suit your taste and budget.
Experience exceptional service and attention to detail.
We cater weddings, office events, parties, corporate lunch ins and more.
On premise Catering
Off premise Catering
Club on Nine Lounge
Indulge in refined elegance at the Club on Nine Lounge. This sophisticated space offers a perfect setting for intimate gatherings, cocktail receptions, or simply unwinding with friends. Whether you’re hosting a business meeting or celebrating a special occasion, our lounge provides a stylish and comfortable atmosphere.
Board Room Meeting Space
Impress clients and colleagues in our professional boardroom. Equipped with state-of-the-art technology and comfortable seating, it’s the perfect setting for productive meetings and presentations. Ideal for corporate retreats, executive meetings, and small conferences.
The Patio and Terrace
The Patio’s open-air ambiance is ideal for hosting unforgettable gatherings! Whether it’s a small get-together with friends, a celebratory office party, or a professional networking event, our team will help craft a memorable experience in this stunning casual setting.
Learn More
Outdoor Event Venue in Ocala, Fl
What makes our venue the ideal choice for your next major event? It’s our unique ability to blend natural Florida beauty with first-class infrastructure. We are more than just an open field; we are a complete event destination.
Expansive 6+ Acre Grounds:
A flexible, blank canvas ready to be transformed for your car show, music festival, or market.
8,000 sq ft Covered Pavilion:
Our Palm Terrace Pavilion offers a massive, weather-proof space for vendor hubs, dining, or main-stage activities.
On-Site Hilton Hotel:
Provide ultimate convenience for your vendors, staff, and attendees with luxurious on-site accommodations.
Ample & Accessible Parking:
We have plenty of space to accommodate hundreds of vehicles, ensuring smooth entry and exit for your guests.
Full-Service Amenities:
Leverage our two on-site restaurants, bar, catering services, and resort-style pool and patio to elevate your event.
Prime Location:
Conveniently located in Ocala with easy access for all of North Central Florida.
Learn More

Romantic Gazebo Weddings
Picture Your Perfect “I Do” at the Romantic Gazebo
Exchange vows in the heart of Ocala, FL, at our enchanting outdoor wedding venue. Our elegant gazebo, nestled on the three-acre Reserve, offers a romantic open-air setting surrounded by stunning views of horses, paddocks, and lush greenery. Perfect for breathtaking photos and intimate celebrations, it’s a dreamy space to begin your forever.
Picture-Perfect Setting
Enchanting Ambiance
Fresh Air & Sunshine
Flexibility & Customization
See Packages and Pricing
Picture-Perfect Setting
Enchanting Ambiance
Fresh Air & Sunshine
Flexibility & Customization
Arrive in Style
Make a grand entrance on your wedding day with a vintage car. Our picturesque gazebo is the perfect backdrop for a timeless arrival. Imagine pulling up in a classic car, stepping out to the applause of your guests, and walking towards your fairytale ceremony. Create a moment that will be cherished forever.
Make Your Wedding Picturesque with a Horse and Carriage
Arriving at a wedding in a horse-drawn carriage is a one-of-a-kind experience. This timeless mode of transportation allows couples to make a grand entrance, reminiscent of fairy tales. The carriage, with its luxurious leather seats and often adorned with beautiful floral arrangements, serves as a stunning backdrop for memorable photographs

Business Meeting Spaces
Ocala Meeting Venue for Business & Corporate Events
We provide more than just a meeting space. Our dedicated event planners, state-of-the-art facilities, on-site hotel, restaurants, and catering services ensure your corporate events are flawlessly executed from start to finish.
Versatile Event Spaces:
11 flexible event spaces
On-Site Accommodations:
Convenient on-site hotel with comfortable accommodations for your attendees.
Comprehensive Amenities:
Two on-site restaurants, dedicated catering services, and state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment.
Expert Event Planning Team:
Our experienced event planning team is dedicated to helping you every step of the way.
Prime Ocala Location:
Conveniently located in Ocala, Florida, our hotel offers easy access for attendees and is close to local attractions, providing opportunities for team building and leisure activities.
View Room in 3D
Conference and Event Rooms
Hilton Ocala is your premier choice for event venues in Ocala, Florida. Our stunning property offers a diverse range of spaces to accommodate events of all sizes and styles, from intimate gatherings to grand galas.
Unmatched Versatility:
Our 11 unique event spaces can be customized to suit any occasion.
Exceptional Amenities:
Enjoy on-site accommodations, dining options, and state-of-the-art technology.
Expert Event Planning:
Our dedicated team will handle every detail, from planning to execution.
Culinary Excellence:
Our talented chefs create exquisite menus to impress your guests.
Prime Location:
Situated in the heart of Ocala, we offer easy access for attendees.
Tailored to Your Needs:
Our experienced event planners will work closely with you to customize every aspect of your event, including:
Event Design and Coordination
Audiovisual Equipment
Catering and Beverage Services
On-site Hotel Accommodations
Meeting and Event Packages
On-Site Catering
Indulge your guests with delectable cuisine prepared by our award-winning chefs. Our on-site catering team specializes in creating personalized menus to suit every taste and dietary requirement. From elegant plated dinners to casual buffets, we have you covered.
Banquet & Catering Services
Convenient On-Site Accommodations
After a productive meeting or a memorable event, relax and recharge in our luxurious guest rooms and suites. With a variety of amenities, including comfortable bedding, high-speed Wi-Fi, and modern conveniences, you’ll have everything you need for a comfortable and convenient stay.
Learn More
Churchill Grand Ballroom
Experience unparalleled elegance in our Churchill Grand Ballroom.
This magnificent space, boasting a 600-person reception capacity and 360 banquet capacity, is a masterpiece of design and functionality. With 4,200 square feet of grandeur and soaring 12-foot ceilings, this ballroom offers endless possibilities for your event.
Learn More
Saratoga Ballroom
Host a meeting or event for up to 172 guests or a refined banquet for 120 attendees. With 1,540 square feet of versatile space and 10-foot ceilings, this room provides the perfect backdrop for your event.
Learn More
Versatile Gathering Spaces:
The Monmouth, Laurel, and Santa Anita breakout spaces offer the perfect blend of flexibility and functionality. Each room provides 840 square feet of space, comfortably accommodating up to 80 guests for a reception or 50 for a banquet. Ideal for smaller meetings, intimate gatherings, or breakout sessions, these rooms can also be combined to accommodate larger groups. Experience the perfect balance of comfort and efficiency in our versatile meeting spaces.
Learn More
Palm Pavilion & Terrace
This expansive outdoor venue offers 8,000 square feet of pure magic, accommodating up to 880 guests for a reception or 600 for a banquet. Immerse yourself in a world of natural beauty with a scenic backdrop and abundant natural light. Our flexible space allows you to design the perfect event.
Learn More
Club on Nine Lounge
Indulge in refined elegance at the Club on Nine Lounge. This sophisticated space offers a perfect setting for intimate gatherings, cocktail receptions, or simply unwinding with friends. Whether you’re hosting a business meeting or celebrating a special occasion, our lounge provides a stylish and comfortable atmosphere.
Learn More
Board Room Meeting Space
Impress clients and colleagues in our professional boardroom. Equipped with state-of-the-art technology and comfortable seating, it’s the perfect setting for productive meetings and presentations. Ideal for corporate retreats, executive meetings, and small conferences.
Learn More
The Patio and Terrace
The Patio’s open-air ambiance is ideal for hosting unforgettable gatherings! Whether it’s a small get-together with friends, a celebratory office party, or a professional networking event, our team will help craft a memorable experience in this stunning casual setting.
Learn More

Ballroom Weddings
Grand Weddings Await at Churchill Grand Ballroom
A ballroom wedding is for the couple who dream of a grand, glamorous celebration.  It offers a level of elegance and luxury that turns any wedding into a memorable event.  Tour newly renovated Churchill Ballroom and pre-function space can hold up to 250 guests, plus a dance floor! Saratoga Ballroom is smaller and more intimate with space for up to 50 guests. Both are modern and elegant spaces to host your unforgettable wedding reception.
Call us today to start planning at 352-646-7163
See packages and prices

Classic Tree Ceremony Setting
Exchange vows beneath centuries-old oaks for a timeless Ocala outdoor wedding.
Natural Elegance:
Say “I do” under a canopy of majestic oak trees with dappled sunlight.
Serene Atmosphere:
Whispering leaves and open-air charm create a romantic backdrop.
Photo-Ready:
Capture stunning shots amid lush greenery and natural textures.
See packages and pricing
Rustic White Barn & Farmhouse
Embrace rustic charm with modern comforts in our barn wedding venue.
Spacious & Versatile:
Host intimate gatherings or 200+ guests in a relaxed, airy setting.
Customizable Decor:
Personalize the space with string lights, floral arches, or vintage accents.
Stunning Backdrops:
Sunset views and open fields elevate your photo gallery.
Learn More
White Gazebo with Scenic Views
A fairytale ceremony spot for outdoor weddings in Ocala.
Picture-Perfect Design:
Curved arches and crisp white trim frame your “I dos.”
Flexible Layout:
Ideal for ceremonies of 20–150 guests.
Golden Hour Magic:
Soft natural lighting enhances photos and ambiance.
Learn More
Palm Pavilion & Terrace | Spacious Outdoor Venue in Ocala
Host grand events under the open sky in our 8,000 sq. ft. pavilion.
Large Capacity:
Accommodates 880 guests for receptions or 600 seated banquets.
All-Weather Ready:
Covered space with sunset views and twinkling terrace lights.
Multi-Event Use:
Perfect for festivals, corporate galas, concerts, and weddings.
Learn More
On and Off Premise Catering
Award-Winning On- & Off-Site Catering
Impress guests with locally inspired cuisine tailored to your vision.
Custom Menus:
Farm-to-table, BBQ, plated dinners, and budget-friendly buffets.
Expert Service:
Professional staff handle setup, serving, and cleanup.
Flexible Options:
Choose from in-house catering or off-site delivery for remote events.

Barn Wedding Venue in Ocala
Rustic Elegance Awaits:
Embrace the rustic charm and uniqueness of our beautiful barn at Hilton Ocala. With versatile spaces for personalization and a spacious, relaxed ambiance, it’s the perfect backdrop for your special day. Capture unforgettable memories with stunning photo opportunities in this picturesque setting. Let your dream barn wedding come true!
Rustic Charm & Uniqueness
Versatility & Personalization
Spacious & Relaxed Ambiance
Memorable Photo Opportunities
See packages and prices
Rustic Charm & Uniqueness
Versatility & Personalization
Spacious & Relaxed Ambiance
Memorable Photo Opportunities
Make Your Wedding Picturesque with a Horse and Carriage
Imagine arriving at your ceremony or departing for your reception in a fairytale setting. Our elegant horse-drawn carriage service adds a touch of timeless romance to your wedding day.
Capture Picture-Perfect Moments:
Create lasting memories with stunning photos as you arrive in style. Our beautiful horses and carriage will be the centerpiece of unforgettable wedding pictures.
Grand Entrance & Grand Exit:
Make a grand entrance at your ceremony or a grand exit as newlyweds, leaving your guests in awe. Our horse-drawn carriage service elevates your wedding experience to a truly magical level.
